I'm the local tanner. I buy fresh animal corpses, tan them, and convert them into fine leather clothes ...I'm buying fresh corpses of {rats}, sheeps, deers and wolves from you.
That's my job. I buy fresh animal corpses, tan them, and convert them into fine leather clothes, which you can buy later in shop.
These are the Lost Lands. Its main continent is Lithaton, which is located to the far east.
This is Flantania Isle. King Celero I sent settlers to this island with the intentions to create a safe environment for new inhabitants of the Lost Lands.
Lithaton is the main continent of the Lost Lands. Casteldine is the capital, and in this city king Arturo lives in his castle.
Casteldine is the capital of Lithaton. From here king Arturo rules the world, sadly with an iron fist. Many people from my home town dislikes him.
I have not much knowledge about this city, but I know that the earlier kings ruled from this city. Also, I am actually employeed by the Celerian Academy.
The Celerian Academy is a mystic institution. Although I have never been there, I haven't heard of anyone who knows where this academy is.
Riona is a nice girl. She is currently selling equipment, and I must say she has sold me some really nice wares.
Gebby is my cousin. She and I moved from my brother Edwyn from Adanac, when we were ordered to move here to open our shops.
If you are looking for help, I am not the right guy. Ask around in the temple, I am sure someone are there for you.
Quests are overrated. I believe one should earn their money through unyielding work and no simple short cuts.
I personally believe he has failed as a king. I, together with many people from my home town, thinks he is way too unsatisfied with the deeds of Natalon.
He sucks.
I collect animal corpses and remake their skin to fine clothes. Thereafter, I usually sell them to a guy called Rooster.
I am Hercules, brother of Gebby and Edwyn.
Leather is a perfect material to create clothes.
Clothes are my passion. I would love to design them myself, but it's way too hard for a simple tanner like myself. I usually sell my leather to Rooster, who therafter sells it to his own customers.
My home town is Adanac.
Natalon was indeed a great man. When the orcish hordes launched their surprise attack onto Casteldine, Natalon and his men was the ones who saved the city from destruction.
Rooster lives in Celeres. I sell him my leather, which he thereafter sell to his customers. Apparently, he's making one hell of a business that way. He's apparently top fashion.
This city is peaceful and nice. My brother Edwyn lives here.
Edwyn is a very kind person, but he has quite a temperament sometimes.
